text: Goniothalamus salicina is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Goniothalamus salicina. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Flora of Sri Lanka salicina Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Goniothalamus salicina
